General.Name: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of fruit and vegetable concentrates and purees in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Döhler Gida Sanayi A.S.
General.Address: Cevizli Mahallesi Zuhal Caddesi Ritim, Istanbul, Turkey
